009package Ch04_Filters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015public class Filter_Box_3x3 implements PlugInFilter {
016
017    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
018        return DOES_8G;
019    }
020
021    public void run(ImageProcessor orig) {
022        final int M = orig.getWidth();
023        final int N = orig.getHeight();
024        final double W = 9;
025        ImageProcessor copy = orig.duplicate();
026
027                for (int u = 1; u <= M - 2; u++) {
028                        for (int v = 1; v <= N - 2; v++) {
029                //compute filter result for position (u, v):
030                int sum = 0;
031                for (int i = -1; i <= 1; i++) {
032                        for (int j = -1; j <= 1; j++) {
033                                                int p = copy.getPixel(u + i, v + j);
034                        sum = sum + p;
035                    }
036                }
037                int q = (int) (sum / W);
038                                orig.putPixel(u, v, q);
039            }
040        }
041    }
042
043}
